segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The devoted mom drying dishes so carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unaware of the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water ruining the floor and cabinets slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children mean well, but they're in peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy stretched out on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One slip and he'll crash with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waiting below, innocent and hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They just want a sweet treat, that's all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risks are too high here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks like a safe haven.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish I could warn them from my spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic bliss is teetering on disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
